mapper.sql: id, service_type, service_item_id, price, status, is_delete, operator_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT tsip.id as id, tsip.service_type as serviceType, tsip.service_item_id, tsip.price, tsip.status, tsip.is_delete, tsip.operator_id as operatorId, tsip.create_time AS createTime, tsip.update_time AS updateTime, tsip.service_item_describe AS serviceItemPriceDescribe, tsi.name as serviceItemName, tsi.service_item_describe as serviceItemDescribe, tsip.price_describe as priceDescribe FROM t_service_item_price tsip LEFT JOIN t_service_item tsi ON tsip.service_item_id = tsi.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT tsip.id as id, tsip.service_type as serviceType, tsip.service_item_id, tsip.price, tsip.status, tsip.is_delete, tsip.operator_id as operatorId, tsip.create_time AS createTime, tsip.update_time AS updateTime, tsip.service_item_describe AS serviceItemPriceDescribe, tsi.name as serviceItemName, tsp.id as servicePackageItemId, tsp.unit, tsp.unit_number as unitNumber, tsp.no_unit_describe AS noUnitDescribe, tsp.unit_describe AS unitDescribe, tsp.service_provider AS serviceProvider, tsp.value, tsp.service_description AS serviceDescription, tsp.service_item_type AS serviceItemType, tsi.service_item_describe as serviceItemDescribe, tsip.price_describe as priceDescribe FROM t_service_item_price tsip LEFT JOIN t_service_item tsi ON tsip.service_item_id = tsi.id LEFT JOIN t_service_package_detail tsp on tsp.service_item_price_id = tsip.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
